## Description

### Programming Languages

- JavaScript
- TypeScript
- Vite

### Frontend

- [React.js](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)
- [EsLint](https://eslint.org/)
- [React Router](https://reactrouter.com/en/main)
- [React-Feather](https://feathericons.com/)
- [Styled-Components](https://styled-components.com/)

## Building

### Install Packages

```
$ npm install
```

### Start Dev Server

```
$ npm run dev
```

## Inspiration
[Keyframe Tech Solution Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LXT9HmITNBM&ab_channel=KeyframeTechSolution)
